title: ISDrama: Immersive Spatial Drama Generation through Multimodal Prompting
author: Yu Zhang (Zhejiang University), Wenxiang Guo (Zhejiang University), Changhao Pan (Zhejiang University), Zhiyuan Zhu (Zhejiang University), Tao Jin (Zhejiang University), Zhou Zhao (Zhejiang University), ...
relevance_why: This paper introduces ISDrama, an innovative approach for real-time multimodal speech synthesis that integrates dramatic prosody and spatial awareness, which could directly inform techniques for improving audio-visual synchronization in audio generation tasks relevant to Haohe Liu's research.
background: This research addresses the task of generating immersive, multi-speaker binaural speech while maintaining dramatic expression and precise spatial audio effects, a crucial aspect for applications in augmented and virtual reality.
contribution: ISDrama introduces MRSDrama, a novel multimodal recorded spatial drama dataset, and an innovative model that integrates pose and dramatic prosody to generate high-quality binaural audio.

technical_comparison.prior_work: Existing methods for binaural audio generation often rely on monaural inputs or lack integration of complex prosody modeling.
technical_comparison.novelty: ISDrama overcomes this limitation by developing a unified framework that captures spatial and prosodic dynamics using multimodal inputs and a novel contrastive learning approach.

key_innovation: Utilizes a Multimodal Pose Encoder and an Immersive Drama Transformer to simultaneously model audio dynamics and spatial characteristics, enhancing expressive speech generation.
real_world_impact: ISDrama offers the potential to revolutionize immersive audio experiences in entertainment and education sectors, allowing for richer storytelling in virtual environments.
limitations: No specific limitations are mentioned by the authors.

new_terms.Multimodal Pose Encoder: **Multimodal Pose Encoder** is a framework that integrates different types of spatial and temporal information from diverse sources to create a unified representation for improved audio generation.
new_terms.Immersive Drama Transformer: **Immersive Drama Transformer** is a generative model that combines various input modalities to produce expressive binaural audio outputs, optimized for spatial accuracy and dramatic prosody.

open_sourcing: Demos and dataset available at https://aaronz345.github.io/ISDramaDemo
